review_text: Whether you're looking for comforts, amenities, a renovated space, great value or gracious hosts, you will find all of this and more at Kirk & Lily's lovely home. Ideally situated on a quiet street in a good neighborhood close to everything (literally no more than 15 minutes to anywhere in Kennewick, Pasco or Richland), the photos and description of this home do not do it justice. The layout - a split-level with full baths on both levels - is highly functional and provides plenty of privacy, while an open living room/dining room/kitchen allows for a great social space. Every bed was super comfortable, and every room gets beautiful natural light. The back deck overlooks a big, beautiful birch tree. Everything is spotless - even the garage. The well-stocked kitchen allowed us to self-cater for most of our two-week stay. Lily and Kirk clearly want guests to have a relaxing stay - case in point, rather than facing a big, intimidating list of chores to do on check-out day you'll instead see a short note about what you can do optionally, if you're not in a rush. That alone speaks volumes about the hosts, and if you have any reason to communicate with them during or after your stay, don't be surprised if you make a new friend!
